== Concept ==

The <nowiki>[[Lubuntu-Artwork|Lubuntu Artwork Team]]</nowiki> is pleased to present you the official artwork shipped with the forthcoming version of <nowiki>[[http://lubuntu.net|Lubuntu]]</nowiki>, version 15.04 codename Vivid Vervet, as well as the Community wallpaper contest winners (when poll finishes).
<<BR>><<BR>>

== Wallpaper ==

Something's changing, but not too fast. We're showing bits and pieces of what our next Desktop will be. Of course, Artwork will be homogeneous and respecting the design lines history we've started. More blue, and more purple. Don't forget the <nowiki>[[https://www.flickr.com/groups/lubuntu1504contest/|Community wallpaper contest]]</nowiki> (thanks to our friends in <nowiki>[[http://picompete.com/|Picompete]]</nowiki>), those submitted by users and fans!

<nowiki>[[attachment:wall.png|<nowiki>[[File:wall_mini.png]]</nowiki></nowiki>]]

== Controls ==

Not many changes here, improvements and a masssive re-merge with the Ubuntu branch from Light Themes. Again, we ensure both gtk libraries match, the old GTK2 and new GTK3 ones (no longer look like different environments).  

<nowiki>[[File:vivid_controls.png]]</nowiki>

== Icons ==

'''Box''' will be updated to version 0.50, improving LXQt desktop integration, with more apps, devices, mimetypes, dialog symbols, panel glyphs and, as always, better colours and metrics.
